game.name: Gooey
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SCIENCE HAS RUN AMUCK! Gooey has come to life! Escape a laboratory seemingly designed to thwart the newly created experiment’s efforts. Sling Gooey’s sticky lil’ hand to grapple through hand-crafted challenges, or build and create levels of your own to share on Steam Workshop.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SCIENCE HAS RUN AMUCK! Gooey has come to life! Escape a laboratory seemingly designed to thwart the newly created experiment’s efforts. Sling Gooey’s sticky lil’ hand to grapple through hand-crafted challenges, or build and create levels of your own to share on Steam Workshop.
